statements: UPDATE customer_data SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

UPDATE customer_behavior SET behavior_3 = 'new_behavior', behavior_1 = 'updated_behavior_1' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customers_preferences SET preference_1 = 'New Value 1', preference_3 = 'New Value 3' WHERE customer_id = 123;

UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_1 = 'new preference 1', preference_2 = 'new preference 2' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'click', behavior_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_1 = 'Camping', preference_2 = 'Photography' WHERE customer_id = 1234;
UPDATE behavior_data SET behavior_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE customer_id = 5678 AND behavior_type = 'Click';
UPDATE CustomerPreferences SET preference_value = 'new_value' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

new_key

}' WHERE recommendation_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
